price: Anaasε wͻn wͻ awurade foforͻ bi ka Nyankopͻn ho? Kronkron Hene ne Nyankopͻn, Ɔkorͻn kyεn deε wͻde bata Neho no.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayru al-lahi sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
